pr_title: Add fishing spot tooltips to worldmap

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't always represent the highest level fish, so either fix the entries for which that's not the case or change the name.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: The worldMapTooltip addition should be added in the same commit as FishingSpotLocation and the other world map code is added, not the one where FishingSpot is moved to a different package.
timeline.author: Nightfirecat
